entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.JSon Source Generator Diagnostic in the error list is doesnt link me to docs or navigate me to the file where the issue is #60314
  • .net Core Runtimes - Display Icon Registry suggestion #60311
  • Singlefile+composite test is failing in SDK repo #60308
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2021-41355 | .NET Core Information Disclosure Vulnerability #60301
  • Hosting multiple instances of an app published with PublishSingleFile and IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract does not work as expected. #60300
  • RyuJIT: Invalidly optimized negated division #60297
    7.0.0
  • Subsequent Grpc calls with WinHttpHandler to an IIS hosted service fail #60291
  • System.ArgumentException : Font '?' cannot be found. on openSUSE docker #60290
  • Trialing an Automated Issue Culling Experiment #60288
    7.0.0
  • BrowserHttpHandler can't stream large responses even with SetBrowserResponseStreamingEnabled #60287
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_BigInteger #60293
    7.0.0
  • In mono arm64, when creating a delegate that returns 16byte-size-struct, the generated code is wrong #60282
  • Test failure JIT\\Methodical\\xxobj\\operand\\refanyval\\refanyval.cmd #60278

Closed

  • Add string indexers for JsonElement #60279
    7.0.0
  • JIT: optimize (T)x | (T)y to (T)(x | y) #13816
    Future
  • .NET misreports current culture after upgrading to .NET6 #60296
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.FileInfo_GetSetTimes.CopyToNanosecondsPresent_LowTempRes #58916
    Future
  • Do not double-return arrays to ArrayPool #33767
    Future
  • [System.Text.Json] Regression: [JsonIgnore] Attribute not Applied to Ref Returns #59936
    6.0.0
  • Regression in File.PreallocationSize #59705
    6.0.0
  • Missing build dependencies not written to console #315
    Future
  • Create spec/doc for JSON serialization #60178
  • Date Format UK #60286
    Future
  • WASM leg failed in CI - RangeError: Maximum call stack size exceeded #59911
  • Review #nullable disable files in Common directory #41439
    7.0.0
  • Thread.Priority ignored on Linux? #60114
  • Failed to compile CLR #60241
  • [interp] Short branch offset can overflow with very large methods #57363
    7.0.0
  • Use file allocation size where it's beneficial #51116
    7.0.0
  • Allow for atomic appends to end of file #53432
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose SafeFileHandle.CanSeek #58370
    7.0.0
  • dbgshim is broken in .NET 6.0-rc1 Windows X86 #60215
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60319
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #60318
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [release/6.0] Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60317
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Implement RSA-PSS signature for CmsSigner #60316
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Eliminate pre-built assets during source-build #60315
  • [metadata] Replace uses of MonoType:byref by a getter #60313
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Remove DIV(NEG(a), C) => DIV(a, NEG(C)) opt #60312
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add runtime.osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports proj file for pa… #60310
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Update Package Validation dependency and update Suppression files #60306
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix type layout diagnostics in the CoreCLR runtime #60305
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Alternative fix of #60182 #60298
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Stabilize for RTM #60294
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Refactoring XmlConvert #60285
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/60282 #60283
    community-contribution
  • Only set PATH on native architecture #60276
    * NO MERGE *, breaking-change, area-Infrastructure-installer, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • fix for generation info in GCMemoryInfo #60309
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make upgrade install new host first, then uninstall old #60307
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix VS4Mac crash report and core dump generation perf problems #60205
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60299
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fallback to read/write if pread/pwrite fails #60280
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.0
  • [hack] Add script to run local Roslyn build on non-Windows #60304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Some Antigen pipeline fixes #60284
  • [release/6.0] [QUIC] Fixed exception type for ConnectionShutdownInitiatedByTransport #60244
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Checkin the work for coreclr around stackalloc, ref fields and arbitrary generics to hackathon tree #60303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use local version of Roslyn to build #60302
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve SortedSet DeepCopy performance #56561
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Prevent runtime prop metadata retrieval when [JsonIgnore] is used #60024
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Fix failures happening in CI on PEImage::LoadFlat/LoadImage #60277
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fixing compilation on windows using debug mode. #60260
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [mono][interp] Fix short branches #58806
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add C# multi-dimension array versions of the Benchstones tests #60192
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Reflection
  • XARCH: Eliminate redundant mov to/from mem. #59780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Add osx-arm64.runtime.native.System.IO.Ports #60084
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Add SetLastError to GdiPlus methods (#59096) #60201
    Servicing-approved
  • [WIP] Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Update SDK to 6.0 RC2 #60256
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable ASAN for CoreCLR #54580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move optdata and version file generation up to MSBuild from build-runtime #58674
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • [mono/win] Increase stack size (reserve) to 8MB #60265
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] rationalize internal exports #60075
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Fix: CTS.TryReset() concurrency issue #60182 #60224
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Bring up full library test CI runs on iOS / tvOS devices #59503
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #60275
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [mono/win] Build native runtime as Debug again #60263
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not throw StackOverflow exception from `ChangeToken.OnChange` #60198
    area-Extensions-Primitives
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize redundant memory barriers on arm/arm64 #60219
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Validate CompressionLevel in BrotliStream ctor #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • lateapexearlyspeed-issue-30778 Create method: TryReadExact(). #57921
    area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • issue 56835 make ordered dictionary kv collection implement i list #60060
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Issue 55685 processname optimisation #59672
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • FileSystemEntry.Unix: ensure properties are available when file is deleted. #60214
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Improve FileProviders.Physical tests to reuse existing helper types #58155
    test enhancement, area-Extensions-FileSystem, 7.0.0
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support in parameters in VB #57111
  • Go To Base/Implementation should be more flexible when signatures do not match #57110
  • Add missing binaries for version stamping by compiler #57107
    17.0
  • Applying a suggested code change fails to apply to the solution -With Recording #57106
  • ReadOnlySpan optimization doesn't work with ternary #57102
  • error CS0121: "The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties" after upgrade from net5.0 to 6.0.0-rc.1.21451.3 #57101
  • InvalidCastException in ValueTracking #57100

Closed

  • Show region label at #endregion #56507
  • Add explicit cast on -= operator produces wrong code #57085

PullRequests

Created

  • Use release version of Debugger.Contracts #57114
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move feature check from lexer to binder. #57113
    Area-Compilers
  • IDECoreBenchmarks Changes #57112
    Area-IDE
  • Add quick runtime checks to ensure core workspace invariants hold. #57109
    Area-IDE
  • Added filescoped namespaces as a structure able to be collapsed #57108
    Area-IDE
  • Handle potential stack overflow in regex parsing. #57105
    Area-IDE
  • Honor MemberNotNullWhen in assignments #57103
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57099
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #57095
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Add experiment to disable weak compilation refs in the compilation tracker #57037
    Area-IDE, Next
  • BoundNullCoalescingOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent left operand conversion. #54538
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Null annotate FileCodeModel and the code model service #57026
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support params Span<T> #57104
    Area-Compilers
  • Refactoring of completion providers for embedded languages #57071
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required, Next
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Add CallerArgumentExpression to VB language feature status doc #55230
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57098
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57086
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Inline Diagnostics: fix rps regression #57094
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57096
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57097
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57116
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Update extract method to support top-level statements #57084
    Area-IDE
  • Codefix for CS1591: Add ///<inheritdoc/> #57004
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support the code definition window #56102
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Fix analysis of MemberNotNullWhen in patterns #57083
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Make path comparison case insensitive #56477
    Area-IDE
  • Support params Span<T> #57078
    Area-Compilers
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't specifically dismiss the sig help session on down key press #51241
    Area-IDE
  • Remove cast tweak cases from https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/57061 #57080
    Area-IDE
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Remove #pragma suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa #56974
    Area-IDE
  • Don't offer to simply to an alias if it has a different meaning #57001
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make IResult methods more testable #37502
  • HotReload - Blazor WA - is not working with Radzen components #37498
  • Blazor With WebView2: CSS Hot Reload Does Not Work #37496
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_dapper, mvc, plaintext #37495
  • Design notes: Unifying design and runtime razor builds #37494
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor class library causes a JS error by default #37492
    6.0.0
  • SignalR Cilent Connection state connected and connectionID is Null ? #37488
  • httpclient Content.Headers.ContentDisposition.FileName returns null when the file name has space in it #37486
  • Blazor-server-side Multi routing such as in mvc #37485
  • [Blazor] Concurrency build issues on CI #37483
    6.0.0
  • CS0234 : The type or namespace name '...' does not exist in the namespace '__Blazor....' #37482
    .NET 7 Planning
  • 0x800704e7 errors from AspNetCoreModuleV2 during IIS recycle #37480
  • Blazor - A question related to the 15547 issue #37477
    Discussions
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper #37476
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, aspnetcore, .NET 7, validation-aspnetcore-.NET 7 #aspnetcore-113594-.NET7 #37473
  • [.Net 6.0] Sampler does not receive the correct ParentId when enabling ActivitySource listener for `Microsoft.AspNetCore` #37471
  • Blazor WASM perf tests are broken in perf lab #37469
    6.0.0

Closed

  • Azure App Services Missing Runtime Microsoft.AspNetCore.App 2.1.26 #36720
  • Startup regression: plaintext #37460
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, mvc #37475
  • Register custom event handlers in DOM and handle those in .NET is not working in .NET 6.0 #37012
    6.0.0
  • Errors from browserlink and aspnetcore-browser-refresh.js when logged into React app #37326
    6.0.0
  • Blazor should have something like an angular directive #37437
    Backlog
  • "There is no event handler associated with this event" when removing the element. #37481
  • Blazor: allow to specify an additional handler on a two-way binding #37405
  • Input validation status gets mixed up when toggling content #37391
  • Optimize DefaultRazorProjectEngine.ProcessDesignTime #37259
  • Need to doc react/spa first request auth issue for 6.0 #36676
    6.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Remove Preview attributes #37151
    7.0-preview1
  • TraceId, RequestId, and TraceIdentifier in ASP.NET Core #31747
    Discussions
  • Blazor Hosted - Memory out of bounds #36872
    6.0.0
  • Allow aspnet-browser-refresh.js to be inserted multiple times #35334
    6.0.0
  • deps.json does not exists after update-databse in package manager console #37478
  • Razor corrupts '<% %>' snippets (3.0.100) #37198
    Backlog
  • Startup improvement: caching, multiple_queries #37438
  • Adding user secrets documentation outdated. #37450

PullRequests

Created

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #37500
  • Update build from source doc 33411 #37497
    community-contribution
  • [main] Update SiteExtension #37491
    area-infrastructure
  • [6.0] Update SiteExtension #37490
    area-infrastructure
  • [5.0] Update SiteExtension #37489
    area-infrastructure
  • Accessibility fixes in templates #37479
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.0
  • [ANCM] Add disableRotatationOnConfig flag to handler settings #37474
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Support setting ApiParameterRoutInfo for endpoints #37470
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #37501
  • Add / update PR templates #37412
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update gRPC template reference to Grpc.AspNetCore #37229
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-grpc, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Health checks can use dependencies that implement IAsyncDisposable only #37297
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Improve project reference consistency #37338
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #37340 #37417
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • `<Virtualize>` Fixing `data-fetching` when horizontal scrolling is present on table layout #37451
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix #37340 by guarding the initial ping for SignalR #37414
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Refresh BuildFromSource docs #37362
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] iOS Placeholder displays on top of Editor #2922
  • Is there any way to apply a default style to a MAUI control? #2919
  • Convert Android Material Button over to using our shadow implementation #2918

Closed

  • [Bug] Padding isn't accounted for in sizing children #1876
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • WPF BlazorWebView: Unable to open multiple WPF windows with BlazorWebView content #2828
    6.0.101-preview.9
  • [Enhancement] Could we use labels instead of the [thing] in issues? #1891
  • [Enhancement] Is there a Windows project example of Maui? #2146

PullRequests

Merged

  • Use new dispatcher instance in each BlazorWebView #2847
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Load IConfigurationProviders once in WebApplicationBuilder #2841
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2913
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Update the Windows App SDK and Win2D #2668
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Make shimmed Frame work on Android/Windows #2677
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.101-preview.9
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Specify the minimum versions of the platforms #2905
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Sign font files included in templates #2009
    area/fonts 🅰️, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Request a re-layout if visibility started as Collapsed #2909
    area/layout 🔲
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
